name: 12 Traps of Christmas (jam edition)
description:
Survive Christmas for 12 days by completing 12 different levels, and face the menacing boss fight at the end!

Features:

  • Fast-paced action platformer
  • Fluid and responsive player movement (but tough to master)
  • 12 different levels with some randomness
  • Super epic boss fight (level 12)
  • More to come...

This game is made for Godot Wild Jam #4. It's still incomplete, but I plan on making a post-jam version with all planned features. Still, majority of features are already in this version.

Good luck and have fun!
